modName: Elder Scrolls Series Fan Tribute to Bethesda and Jeremy Soul
summary:
Elder Scrolls Series
Fan Tribute to Bethesda and Jeremy Soule
Second Compilation
descriptionHtml:
Elder Scrolls Series
Fan Tribute to Bethesda and Jeremy Soule
Second Compilation
The second collection of songs created by the many fans of Bethesda\'s great series, The Elder Scrolls.

Link to first compilation
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2366

Bethesda has made some great games over the years and this can be easily seen by the millions of people who have purchased Skyrim already and the thousands logged onto steam every day, playing the game religiously.
We all listen to the in-game music as it is probably some of the most epic scores you will ever hear. Hat\'s off to Jeremy Soule and his masterpiece.
Most PC users are accustomed to using mods for Elder Scroll games; however one might not always venture to YouTube to find some absolutely magical musical gems all devoted to Bethesda\'s creation, Skyrim. These are mods too; they modify the music of Skyrim to give us a unique listening experience.
An already wonderful score has been re-created by many fans making their own rendition of the wonderful Jeremy Soule music.
All of these files require permission to be used...
Please note ALL these files are the property of Bethesda, regardless of who has created the version.
We suggest that all of you log on to YouTube and search for some of these talented artists and comment on their pages. The song names and usernames should match that on YouTube
The files are supplied \"as is\", which means the way the files were created. I have not edited their files; I have not \"mastered\" anything, they might all be different sample rates. Some files were converted from YouTube to mp3 or video due to the owner no longer having the original files.
Elder Scrolls games have amassed a great community and each person is capable of adding something special to the game. These people are true to life Bards!

I would like to add that I have not performed any of these tracks; I was merely persistent enough to dredge through thousands of songs created by fans and pick the best ones. It has taken me nearly a week of listening to songs all day to come with a decent selection for everyone to hear.
They are all the variation of similar songs, so you might get sick of the Skyrim Main theme by the end of it!
Anyhow, the people who you will be listening to in this tribute were kind enough to allow their work to be heard for free, as it should be, by allowing me permission to use their files.
Please follow the links provided to go to their YouTube page and leave them a comment on their page or leave a comment on my download page.
This second compilation adds more comedy, many parodies as well as a few great videos to watch!
 
Track Listings

**** Please note I have asked permission for EVERY file in this compilation, regardless if it was freely available as an upload. ****
Do not use any of these files without permission
•	Billy Nat Skyrim Main Theme
http://www.youtube.com/user/BillieNat
•	TGN Skyrim - Official Trailer Parody, ft. Yong! - WAY 

Permission was granted by both the user and TGN using this file without permission is a breach of copyright law.
TGN: http://www.youtube.com/user/TGN
TGN Website: http://tgn.tv/
•	RazgrizFX9  Dragons of Skyrim (Midi)
http://www.youtube.com/user/RazgrizFX9
•	Suck My D (Skyrim Theme Parody) -- MaximusBlack
http://www.youtube.com/user/MaximusBlack
•	Skyrim - Main theme Full Version 2 Taioo
•	Skyrim - Main theme Version 1 Taioo
•	From Arena to Skyrim - All Elder Scrolls themes Taioo
•	Morrowind - Main theme (Call of Magic) Taioo
•	Oblivion - Main theme (Reign of the Septims) Taioo
•	Skyrim - Dragon Fight themes Taioo
•	Fallout_ New Vegas - Main theme (BONUS!) Taioo
•	Fallout_ New Vegas - Radio piano medley (BONUS 2!) Taioo

http://www.youtube.com/user/Taioo

•	Stephen Walking - The Elder Scrolls Dubstep Re-Orchestration

http://www.youtube.com/user/StephenWalking

•	VandGmelodies ~Ode To Tamriel~
http://www.youtube.com/user/VandGmelodies
•	Skyrim Parody(Chipmunk) therangerjoe526

http://www.youtube.com/user/therangerjoe526
•	 Skyrim Theme - 8bit DerChaot28

http://www.youtube.com/user/DerChaot28

•	Sheogorath does the \"Cheesespin\" (leekspin) 
http://www.youtube.com/user/leadlegirl
•	Morrowind Theme Song ~ Vocal Cover Seadryad
http://www.youtube.com/user/seadryad

•	Morrowind Theme - Mario Paint  MickeRamone

http://www.youtube.com/user/MickeRamone

•	Morrowind Call of Magic MrKenor Acoustic

http://www.youtube.com/user/MrKenor

•	Elder Scrolls V_ Skyrim - Curse of the Necromancer cyotecody5 + Pavel Zuk
•	Curse_of_the_Necromancer (Instrumental) Pavel Zuk

http://www.youtube.com/user/pavelzuk
http://www.youtube.com/user/cyotecody5

•	The Elder Scrolls Arena Original Soundtrack - Track 14
•	Elder Scrolls Daggerfall II Main Theme 


These games are now free to download from Bethesda. (I have used the songs from those games)

 
•	Tales From Skyrim_ Throthgar The Dragonborn Part 1 (Video)
•	Tales From Skyrim_ Throthgar The Dragonborn Part 2 (Video)
This hilarious series comes from http://www.youtube.com/user/Tyrannicon
•	The Silly Adventures of Mr. Mochi (an Oblivion Machinima) (Video)
http://www.youtube.com/user/theninjacowboy

•	I Have A Feeling (Fargoth\'s Song) Wobblescoff
•	Morrowind Nord Song (How Does it Feel?) Wobblescoff
http://www.youtube.com/user/WobbleScoff
•	The Elder Scrolls VI_ Equestria MrYaridovich (Video)
http://www.youtube.com/user/MrYaridovich

I hope you enjoy the music!
Please note this is not a mod that adds music to your game, it\'s just a set of music that you can listen to, carry on an mp3 player or what not.
It may be difficult to make a third compilation, however I am still waiting for over two dozen people to get back to me, so it depends if people submit their work or link me to other songs.

Hope you enjoy,
Regards,
Tony Colella
(Sydney666)
author: Sydney666 aka Tony Colella and various artists
